column5: Hey all,  Heading north this weekend to our place by three mile lake north of Bracebridge.  We were thinking of going for a nice dinner in town for our 1 year wedding annv.  Can anyone recommend restaurants in either area? Doesnt have to be fine dining but not interested in a pub or diner type place.  Thanks all!
Rebbecca's in Port Carling is a great spot - fantastic food.  http://rebeccasfinedining.com/
It's been a while, but back when I lived in Port Carling and wanted to impress a girl I'd bring her to Shamrock Lodge for dinner.   http://www.shamrocklodge.com/dining.html
Might also consider Tecca at the Red Leaves Resort (Minett... my personal Fav for that area)
I was going to say Rebecca's as well....my parents like to go there for a treat.  There's also Windermere house....I know that's close to you.
Already called them:) Closed till May 18   Ill give one of the other recommendations a try.. Thanks all
Lake Joe club is a very nice spot.  Port Sandfield.
